casebody.data:
Matthew FERNSCHILD
v.
COMMISSIONER OF MOTOR VEHICLES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018 Drew S. Graham, assistant attorney general, in support of the petition. Devin W. Janosov, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 472 , 172 A.3d 864 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
